fxInfo_notes: Average of Freedom House (fh_pr and fh_cl) is transformed to a scale 0-10 and Polity(p_polity2) is transformed to a scale 0-10. These variables are averaged into fh_polity2.
fxInfo_responses: Scale ranges from 0-10 where 0 is least democratic and 10 most democratic.
fxInfo_sources: Freedom House (2018). Taken from Teorell et al (2018).
name: e_fh_polity2
